body.p:
The standard WaveStar Color Monitor has a 4-wire or 2-wire plus ground, RS-422/RS-485 compatible interface. The communications parameters for the upstream interface are the following:
9600 baud (default) with options for 19200 and 38400 baud.
8-bit, even parity, and 1 stop bit are standard with options for odd parity and no parity. RS485/RS422 cable length can be up to 4000 ft. if the cable conforms to these specifications:
The cable must be shielded with two (2) twisted pairs and shield/ground.
The two transmit lines must be in one (1) twisted pair and the two (2) receive lines must be in the other twisted pair.
The cable resistance should be 27 ohms/1000ft @ 1 kHz or less.
The mutual capacitance should be 14pf/ft. @ 1 kHz or less. RS422 is typically 4-wire. RS485 is typically 2-wire and is slower than RS422.
